text: (nabiye! ma hata avanata vu) mage vahalunta oba mese pavasanu: “ovun (ema minisun samaga kata kala vuvada), kumak hondada eyama pavasanu mænava! niyata vasayenma seyitan ovun atare (naraka vacana kiyana se salasva) napurama karanu æta. (mandayat) niyata vasayenma seyitan minisunta prakata satureku vasayenma sitinneya. (ebævin itamat pravesamen sitinu)”
